summary: A top secret Government project has produced giant spiders and they have escaped, killing and eating everything in sight.

Cannell|Matt Whittaker|Clayton Taylor|Charles Halford|Steve Bilich|Kiernan Ryan Daley|Cory McMillan|Connie Young|Marc Raymond|James C. Morris|Johnny Tall|Christopher Robin Miller|Paul Kiernan|K. Danor Gerald|Jill Adler|Terri Douglas|Jesse Gatling|Kerry Pence|Amee Walden
title: Arañas devoradoras
